subtitle: A super, sticky winter dessert which can be made in minutes. The combination of toffee nuts and crisp fruit is absolutely delicious.

method.text: Place pear slices in a bowl with the lemon juice. Toss until well coated.
Place the butter and cinnamon in a saucepan. Heat gently for 1-2 min, stirring occasionally until butter has melted.
Add the sugar and dissolve over a gentle heat for 2 min. Increase heat, cook for 1 min, stirring continuously, until thickened slightly and mixture becomes glossy. Remove from heat.
Add bananas, walnut halves and raspberries. Very gently toss together until well coated.

title: Toffee tossed fruits and nuts
